explains: n. 承保人，保险商（尤指船只）；核保人（对投保项目进行风险评估并决定保险费率）
wordGroup: lead underwriter 主承销商；主要包销商

sentences.en: If the market will not buy the shares, the underwriter buys them.
sentences.cn: 如果市场不买这些股票，包销商就会买。

sentences.en: the name of the underwriter and related agreements.
sentences.cn: 承销机构名称及有关的协议。

sentences.en: Depending on whether an operation is invoked by the customer or by the underwriter, the returned behavior may be quite different.
sentences.cn: 根据某个操作是由客户还是由担保人调用的，所返回的行为可能会有很大不同。
